transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Ji boliye.
Customer: Hello? Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji mam, main Manisha baat kar rahi hu mam.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan ji mam, maine na aapko ek WhatsApp pe lead share ki hai. Ek to turmeric powder ki aur ek chili powder hai na jo aapke paas product aapne hum bataya tha uska aapko chahiye the to maine WhatsApp pe share ki hai. Wo Rajasthan se mainly lead hai. Aap unhe consume kijiyega. And mam ek na matlab mere ko janna tha ki aapke paas mein WhatsApp pe ek feedback aaya tha. To aapne usme na unsatisfied kar diya tha actually. Thik hai? To uh usko actually mam wo jo feedback hota hai na mere liye hota hai ki shayad isse ek second, ek second mam.
Executive: Mere liye hota hai mam wo feedback ki maine shayad aapki help nahi ki ya fir aap satisfied nahi hai meri services se. To wo actually jo feedback hota hai na mere name se record ho jata hai.
Customer: To isiliye maine aapko confirm kiya tha.
Customer: Ji ji bataiye.
Customer: Main aisa keh rahi hu ki actually uh aapne jo mujhe India matlab IndiaMART pe jo bheja hai main wo dekh lungi aur jo aapko feedback chahiye wo bhi main dekh lungi. Actually wo handle kam wala mera nahi hai.
Executive: Wo actually koi aur handle karta hai.
Customer: Mera kehna ye hai ki jo IndiaMART ka jo kaam hai wo koi aur handle karta hai. Wo just abhi bahar gayi hai. To aap mujhe ek ghante ke baad call kar sakte hai.
Executive: Wo usme na mam wo abhi available nahi hai kya?
Customer: Ji ji bilkul. Wo aadhe ghante mein aapko mil jayenge. Lunch par gaye hai actually.
Executive: Okay okay thik hai.
Executive: To aap aadhe ghante mein wapas call kar dijiyega.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur main bol dungi aapka message bhi de dungi unko aur aapko agar aise koi urgent bhi hai to aapke feedback ke liye aap mujhe wapas call kar dijiyega main baat karne ko kahungi thik hai.
Customer: Ji ji bilkul mam. Important tha actually thik hai. Main mam call karungi.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul bilkul bilkul mam. Main main aap main yaad se keh dungi aapko okay.
Customer: Thik hai. Okay mam. Thank you mam.
Executive: Okay mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to know about unsatisfied feedback.

- Customer says someone else handles IndiaMART work.



Resolution:

- Executive shared buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Customer will check the leads and feedback.

- Executive informed customer to call back in 30 minutes.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, feedback, whatsapp, call back
